message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. This is a great deal, considering its value to me is at least $15000. Let me know if you're interested!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the unique product you're selling, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $10000?

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I understand that $10000 is a bit below my minimum price, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer it to you for $18000. This is still a great deal, considering its value to me is at least $15000. Let me know if you're interested!

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate the compromise, but I am still looking to stay within my budget. Could you consider selling the product to me for $16000? I believe this would be a fair price given its value to you.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're still looking to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to go below $17000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $17000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering its value to me is at least $15000. Let me know if you're interested!

Hello Alice, thank you for your latest offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $16500 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're getting close to your budget, but I'm still not willing to go below $17000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $16800. This is the highest I'm willing to go, considering its value to me is at least $15000. Let me know if you're interested!

Hello Alice, thank you for your last offer. I appreciate your effort to reach a compromise. Given my budget considerations, I would like to propose a final price of $16600 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
